item.title: Potential Students
item.dc:creator: wp
item.description: Has your educational experience been impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic? Are you a K-12 student looking for one-on-one academic help? Our project aims to support those who cannot afford tutoring amidst the difficulty of the pandemic. If this applies to you or someone you know, please fill out the form below and we will be […]
item.content:encoded:
Has your educational experience been impacted by the COVID-19 pandemic? Are you a K-12 student looking for one-on-one academic help?

Our project aims to support those who cannot afford tutoring amidst the difficulty of the pandemic. If this applies to you or someone you know, please fill out the form below and we will be in touch about scheduling tutoring sessions:

Fill in Form

item.title: Volunteer Opportunity
item.dc:creator: wp
item.description: We need your help! We are recruiting volunteers to offer free online tutoring services to K-12 students who do not have access to or cannot afford academic support.
item.content:encoded:
We need your help! We are recruiting volunteers to offer free online tutoring services to K-12 students who do not have access to or cannot afford academic support.

Apply Here
